remarks: Virtual deduction generalizing rule for 2 quantifying variables and 1 virtual hypothesis. ~ gen12 is ~ alrimivv with virtual deductions. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 2-May-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
gen12.1 $e |- (. ph ->. ps ). $.
gen12 $p |- (. ph ->. A. x A. y ps ). $.
$d ph x $.
$d ph y $.
